UnitInfo.Strategy: The Erlking is summoned by the Faerie World Spell, which unleashes the Wild Hunt. Every unit that fights the Erlking joins the hunt as a Wild Hunter.

UnitInfo.Civilopedia: Fetches steal the race promtion of the units they defeat.
Huntsman can be summoned by the Erlking, when he calls the Wild Hunt.

UnitInfo.Strategy: The nobility of the Summer Court
The nobility of the Winter Court
The ultimate Faerie, the Fae lords are the nobility of the Eternal Court, and have the powers of all Faeries.
Foxfire, the Faerie Hero, is a magical beast with the cunning of a fox, and will split into more foxes when defeated.

UnitInfo.Civilopedia: Larincsidhe restored to his original power that he had back in the Age of Magic.
